title: Bottlerocket – Minimal, immutable Linux OS with verified boot
dot: digraph Bottlerocket{rankdir=LR;subgraph cluster_main{label="Bottlerocket";"Bottlerocket OS"->"Container Orchestration (Kubernetes/ECS)";"Bottlerocket OS"->"Minimal";"Bottlerocket OS"->"Safe Updates";"Bottlerocket OS"->"Security Focused";}subgraph cluster_minimal{label="Minimal";"Exclude Unneeded Software"->"Reduce Operational & Security Overhead";"Manage Complexity via Variants"->"Tailor-made for Requirements";"No Shell in Bottlerocket"->"Use Privileged Host Containers";}subgraph cluster_safe_updates{label="Safe Updates";"No Package Manager"->"Use Image for Updates";"Multiple Partitions"->"Atomic Update at Reboot";"API for System Settings"->"Migrate Settings between Versions";"Manual/Operator Tools (brupop/ECS updater)"->"Manage Updates";}subgraph cluster_security_focused{label="Security Focused";"Variants (No Package Registry/Manager)"->"Avoid System Mutation";"Rust & Golang (Memory Safety)"->"Built - in Protection";"Immutable Root Filesystem (dm - verity)"->"Integrity Checking";"SELinux Policy"->"Restrict Container Operations";}}
